text: Fu Jen Catholic University (FJU; ) is a well known university in Taiwan. The main campus is in New Taipei City. It was first started in 1925. Its first name was Catholic University of Peking (currently Beijing Normal University). It was started again in 1961. Fu Jen is the Wade–Giles romanization of the Chinese characters 輔仁 (Furen in pinyin), literally meaning "assistance" and "benevolence". ==Related pages== *Roman Curia *Society of Jesus *Benedictine ==References== ==Other websites== *Fu Jen Category:Colleges and universities in Taiwan Category:1925 establishments in Asia Category:1961 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Taiwan
title: Fu Jen Catholic University
